text: Events from the year 1915 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Nicholas II * Chairman of the Council of Ministers – Ivan Logginovich Goremykin ==Events== * Battle of Ardahan * Gorlice–Tarnów Offensive * Great Retreat (Russian) * Sventiany Offensive ==Births== ==Deaths== *27 February – Nikolay Yakovlevich Sonin, mathematician (born 1849) *1 September – August Stramm, German playwright and poet (born 1874) * * * ==References== 1915 in Russia Category:Years of the 20th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1915 in Russia
